books.title: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach
books.overview: A comprehensive introduction to AI, covering a wide range of topics from search algorithms to machine learning.
books.suitable_for: Beginners and intermediate learners seeking a thorough understanding of AI principles.
books.availability: Available on major online retailers and academic bookstores.

books.title: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow
books.author: Aurélien Géron
books.overview: A practical guide focusing on implementing machine learning and deep learning algorithms using Python libraries.
books.suitable_for: Individuals with basic programming knowledge aiming to apply AI techniques.
books.availability: Available on major online retailers and academic bookstores.

books.title: Deep Learning
books.overview: An authoritative resource on deep learning, exploring theoretical foundations and practical applications.
books.suitable_for: Advanced learners and professionals interested in deep learning research.
books.availability: Available on major online retailers and academic bookstores.

online_courses.title: AI For Everyone
online_courses.overview: A non-technical course designed to introduce AI concepts and their implications in various industries.
online_courses.suitable_for: Beginners and business professionals seeking to understand AI's impact.

online_courses.title: Machine Learning
online_courses.overview: A comprehensive course covering fundamental machine learning algorithms and techniques.
online_courses.suitable_for: Individuals with a background in programming and basic mathematics.

online_courses.title: Deep Learning Specialization
online_courses.overview: A series of courses delving into deep learning, neural networks, and their applications.
online_courses.suitable_for: Learners with prior machine learning experience aiming to specialize in deep learning.

online_courses.title: Elements of AI
online_courses.overview: An accessible course introducing AI concepts, designed for learners without a technical background.
online_courses.suitable_for: Anyone interested in understanding the basics of AI.

online_courses.title: Artificial Intelligence: Principles and Techniques
online_courses.overview: An advanced course covering AI principles, including search, reasoning, and machine learning.
online_courses.suitable_for: Learners with a strong foundation in computer science and mathematics.
